sub_title: Science Specialist & Team Lead at Aramco Research Center - Delft, Aramco Europe
summary:
15+ years experience in research and HPC software development, covering the fields of seismic data processing and inversion, computational imaging, optimization algorithm design, and HPC software coding in C/C++/CUDA/OpenMP/MPI. In-depth knowledge in Linux and cluster system building/maintenance. Currently leading a team focusing on research and development for HPC solutions in the field.

My google scholar profile: https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=WAVjMTEAAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=pubdate
